vision.notes: Inferred to be present and important for diurnal predation, given the description of large wings and day-active behavior. Similar to cockroaches in superficial appearance.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely present for detecting prey and navigating the environment, inferred from their predatory lifestyle and relation to other insect orders.

chemoreception.notes: Likely present for locating prey and potential mates. Common in insects.
